decks.name: React Router
decks.description: This is a study deck to review React Router terminology

cards.back:
- Used as an alias for <BrowserRouter>
- Defines the scope of routing within the app

- Manages multiple <Route> components
- Acts as decision-maker and determines which component should be rendered based on the current URL

- Renders the UI when its path matches the current URL
- One without a path always matches the URL
- Allows the user to navigate between pages without having to type into the address bar
